issue: Small mobile (375px) font size is 24px instead of 20px

attempts.action: Added 'screen' media type and !important declarations to small mobile media query to ensure font-size: 20px and line-height: 26px override the mobile breakpoint styles
attempts.reasoning: The media query existed but may not have been applying correctly due to specificity issues or inline styles. Using !important ensures the small mobile styles override any conflicting rules.
